headline: Southern as You Can Get Collard Greens
name: Southern as You Can Get Collard Greens
description: This is as Southern as you can get.
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch collard greens - rinsed, trimmed and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place the collard greens and ham hocks in a large pot. Mix in the chicken broth, water, and vinegar. Season with salt and pepper. Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer 1 hour.
